name: Ball Drop (Jay Andrade-Hunt)
description:
Can you survive 4 minutes?

Objective

Stop the balls from entering the centre.

Controls

Hold down click to interact with the stage.

Dev Notes 

I originally made this game to experiment with item pooling and made it into a little game. (When I had spare time one week). Everything is made by myself using blender and Unity. The materials/textures are all made in Shader Graph.
